PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2001-07742001-05-010,  ,  CITIZENSHIP,  , 
PrecisRe-appointment of MICHEL M.J. SHORE, of Hampstead, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Convention Refugee Determination Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montreal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years; and designation of MICHEL M.J. SHORE as a coordinating member of the Convention Refugee Determination Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montreal Regional Office) for a term of two years; effective April 15, 2001.
